title: IngredientAnalysis
description: A structured analysis of the ingredients that includes potential cuisine types, dietary restrictions, and flavor profiles.

cuisine_types.title: Cuisine Types
cuisine_types.description: Possible cuisine types that can be made with the ingredients.

dietary_restrictions.title: Dietary Restrictions
dietary_restrictions.description: Any dietary restrictions that apply to the ingredients, such as gluten-free or vegan.

flavor_profiles.title: Flavor Profiles
flavor_profiles.description: The general flavor profiles that can be achieved with the ingredients, like savory, sweet, spicy, etc.
